title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
description: Border from a palampore in white with red, blue and violet colors that are dulled to nearly brown. The design shows symmetrical, conventional swags of flowers and fruits, probably inspired by European patterns. Above each swag is a leaf and below a butterfly. Narrow guard border at the bottom of a curving vine crossed by small blossom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave. 1955-113-1.
